javadoc: Interface for listeners to format model changes.

methods.javadoc:
Notifies that a new format model was added to the format manager.
@param model the new model.
methods.name: formatModelAdded
methods.comment: Notifies that a new format model was added to the format manager.

methods.javadoc:
Notifies that a format model was removed.
@param model the model that was removed.
methods.name: formatModelRemoved
methods.comment: Notifies that a format model was removed.

methods.javadoc:
Notifies that the given format model was changed.
@param model the model that was changed.
methods.name: formatModelChanged
methods.comment: Notifies that the given format model was changed.

name: FormatModelListener
comment: Interface for listeners to format model changes.
